attributes.additional_details: I want the law changed!!! CSA have to give an allowance for kids that live with the person who paying the CSA. In my case my childrens father partners kids get allowance of £75 and my children his biological children only get £60 take away another £17 for the nights a year hes suppose to have the children which £43 a week.Children that he lives with should not be taken into account and also have a bigger allowance than his own children. I WANT THE LAW CHANGING
